zone.line: It feeds the quick growth of the g s erpent vine
And the dark linked ivy tangling wild
And budding, blown, or odour-faded blooms
Starring the winds with points of coloured light
As they rain through them, & bright, golden globes
Of fruit, suspended in their own green heaven;
And , through their veined leaves & amber stems
The flowers whose purple & translucid bowls
Stand ever mantling with aerial dew,
The drink of spirits; and it circles round 280
Like the soft hum of fountain-gathered dreams
Inspiring calm & happy thoughts, like mine
Now thou art thus restored ... that Cave is thine
A Spirit arises in the likeness of a winged child
Arise! appear! this is my torch-bearer
Who let his lamp out in old time with gazing
On eyes from which he kindled it anew
With love which is as fire sweet Daughter mine
For such a i s that within thine own â€” run
And guide this company beyond the peak
Of Bacchic Nysa, Mænad-haunted mountain.282
